name: generate_metadata
description: Generates metadata for an image, including long caption, asset title, and keywords.

longcaption.description: A two or three sentences description of the image, elaborating on image content, context, and notable features.

assettitle.description: A title suitable for social media or gallery display. Should be under 5 words.

googlekeywords.description: A list of relevant search keywords associated with the image.
